TopicTitle: Waiter, theres a _____________ in my soup!

Articles.Content:
Oops. That seems to be the oxygen plasma soup.

Waiter! There's supercritical plutonium-238 in my soup!

Meh, dealed with extraordinarily radioactive elements before.

Waiter, the planet Venus is in my soup! It is superheating it beyond the point of edibility!

Naw man, that's just a gas giant.

Waiter! There's a ghost in my soup!

Quick! Call the ghostbusters!

Waiter, there's a Mountain Dew can in my soup!

Indeed, sir, did you not ask for mountain soup?

Waiter, someone SSH'd into my soup and deleted all the noodles! Does your chef know how to exchange encryption keys??

Well, uh, Aiden Pearce infected it...

Waiter, a wrong post is in my soup!

Banned for mentioning wrong posts.

Welcome to the weird inexplicable restaurant, how tough are you?

I did not see a soup...

KEEP ON THE TOPIC!

Waiter!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! There is a venus in my soup!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

While true do

Turtle.attack()

End

Put it back in orbit.

Waiter, there's a squid girl in my soup.

Put her in the electrified cages supplied.

Waiter, there's a hole in the spacetime continuum in my soup!

RUN BEFORE THE B- (gets sucked in the black hole soup)

Waiter, why are there always WALRUSUS in my soup?!

That's the mirror soup, sir. [people sitting nearby yell "BBBBBUUUUURRRRRNNNNNEEEEEDDDDD!"]

Waiter! Ther-[bOOM]

I'm terribly sorry sir, please excuse Chef Jim's explosive diarrhea.

Waiter! 0.25 is in my soup!

Wait, what?! Sir, run! Everyone run while you still-"

*loud rumbling*

*HYPETRAIN impacts restaurant and soup at 0.4c*

Waiter! My soup is improperly cubemapped! The surface is reflecting annoying pink grids instead of the surroundings!

Your what did whaaaa?

Waiter! There's a LEGOÃ¢â€žÂ¢Ã‚Â©Ã‚Â®Ã¢â€žÂ Ã‚Â®Ã¢â€žÂ¢Ã‚Â© in my soup!

Bloody Trademarks! Kill it!

Waiter, 01100001 01110011 01110011!

Sorry, I don't have my binary cybernetics system installed yet. May your repeat that in Equestrian?

Waiter, there's a merc in my soup...

God dam commies!

Waiter! There's bacon in my soup!

Baconwich, yeah!

WAITER! THERE'S BILLY MAYS IN MY SOUP!

Ahhhhhhhhhhhhhh

waiter my soup has a space marine in it

Tell it there's an alien over there and it'll jump out of your soup.

Waiter! There's a Bon Jovi in my soup!

Better gobble it up, it ain't gonna live forever!

Waiter, there's a stinky pile of poo in my soup.

You know you want it. ( ÃÂ¡Ã‚Â° ÃÅ“ÃŠâ€“ ÃÂ¡Ã‚Â°)

Waiter, there's nothing in my soup.

thats becuase you ate the pice of cyandie in it

waiter no being in my soup seriuously

But its so comphy in herez....

Waiter there's a forum in mah soop
